channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- MQ Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- MQ Appliance

item.title: CVE-2020-4592|2024-08-04T08:07:48.988Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.1.CD and LTS could allow an authenticated user, under nondefault configuration to cause a data corruption attack due to an error when using segmented messages.

item.title: CVE-2020-4498|2024-08-04T08:07:49.008Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.1 LTS and 9.1 CD could allow a local privileged user to obtain highly sensitve information due to inclusion of data within trace files. IBM X-Force ID: 182118.

item.title: CVE-2020-4465|2024-08-04T08:07:48.681Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ, IBM MQ Appliance, and IBM MQ for HPE NonStop 8.0, 9.1 CD, and 9.1 LTS is vulnerable to a buffer overflow vulnerability due to an error within the channel processing code. A remote attacker could overflow the buffer using an older client and cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 181562.

item.title: CVE-2021-38999|2024-08-04T01:58:16.516Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information by inclusion of sensitive data within trace.

item.title: CVE-2020-4375|2024-08-04T08:00:07.247Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ, IBM MQ Appliance, IBM MQ for HPE NonStop 8.0, 9.1 CD, and 9.1 LTS could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service due to a memory leak caused by an error creating a dynamic queue. IBM X-Force ID: 179080.

item.title: CVE-2020-4931|2024-08-04T08:14:59.186Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ 9.1 LTS, 9.2 LTS, and 9.1 CD AMQP Channels could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service due to an issue processing messages. IBM X-Force ID: 191747.

item.title: CVE-2021-39000|2024-08-04T01:58:16.523Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information by inclusion of sensitive data within diagnostics. IBM X-Force ID: 213215.

item.title: CVE-2020-4267|2024-08-04T08:00:06.915Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ and MQ Appliance 8.0, 9.1 LTS, and 9.1 CD could allow an authenticated user cause a denial of service due to a memory leak. IBM X-Force ID: 175840.

item.title: CVE-2021-38958|2024-08-04T01:51:20.818Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS is affected by a denial of service attack caused by a concurrency issue. IBM X-Force ID: 212042

item.title: CVE-2020-4869|2024-08-04T08:14:59.119Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a buffer overflow. A remote attacker could send a specially crafted SNMP query to cause the appliance to reload. IBM X-Force ID: 190831.

item.title: CVE-2020-4938|2024-08-04T08:14:59.194Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.1 and 9.2 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 191815.

item.title: CVE-2021-38986|2024-08-04T01:58:16.429Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 212942.

item.title: CVE-2020-4319|2024-08-04T08:00:07.643Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ, IBM MQ Appliance, and IBM MQ for HPE NonStop 8.0, 9.1 LTS, and 9.1 CD could allow under special circumstances, an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information due to a data leak from an error message within the pre-v7 pubsub logic. IBM X-Force ID: 177402.

item.title: CVE-2021-38967|2024-08-04T01:51:20.836Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS could allow a local privileged user to inject and execute malicious code. IBM X-Force ID: 212441.

item.title: CVE-2024-25048|2024-06-04T17:35:01.063Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.3 CD and LTS are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 283137.
